channel.title: Victoria Park on Broomhill Community Council
channel.description: Recent content in Victoria Park on Broomhill Community Council

item.title: Spring Into Summer – Rescheduled Community Event
item.description: The Spring Into Summer community event has been rescheduled – join us for a fun day of activities on Saturday 30 August!

item.title: Ukrainian Family Fun Day in Victoria Park
item.description: Join us in Victoria Park on Sunday 24 August for a Ukrainian Family Fun Day — a free event open to everyone!
